item.title: The AI Bubble Paradox: Why OpenAI's $500 Billion Valuation Proves The Opposite
item.description: Sam Altman warns of an AI bubble even as OpenAI nears a $500B valuation—signaling short-term froth but long-term infrastructure revolution.
